string.text: Dushman's Intelligence
If Dushman has kept his word, this case contains drawn up maps and notes that'll be invaluable to UNISG. Should drastically reduce the risk that future UNISG missions will entail.
Hollow Boundaries: Intelligence
Major Hernandez has tasked me to find a man known as "Dushman", and retrieve important intelligence that the UN paid him for.
Hollow Boundaries: Rendevous
Major Hernandez and his squad have settled in a place the locals call "Jupiter". I must bring the intelligence to the specified location.
Hollow Boundaries: Investigate the Jupiter Factory
Hollow Boundaries: Return to Hernandez
We must search the Jupiter Factory for the briefcase. Witnesses should be eliminated.
Once we've ensured the area is secure, I should bring this briefcase to Major Hernandez.
Hollow Boundaries: Breakthrough
Hollow Boundaries: Talk to Hernandez
I have been assigned to take point through Jupiter Underground. The major will follow with the rest of his squad. Orders are to advance and keep an eye out for any papers that may still be down here.
I have found some documents. I should show them to Major Hernandez.
Investigate the Agroprom Underground
Investigate the Agroprom Underground and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate Lab X-18
I've been assigned to investigate Lab X-18 and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate Lab X-16
I've been assigned to investigate Lab X-16 and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate Lab X-19
I've been assigned to investigate Lab X-19 and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate Lab X-8
I've been assigned to investigate Lab X-8 and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Mystery Uncovered
I've found sufficient evidence of a major conspiracy. I should return to the Major with my findings - he'll be pleased to see what I've uncovered.
Crossfire: Eliminate the Military forces
Crossfire: Deal with Strelok
Crossfire: Escort Strelok
Crossfire: Talk to Strelok
Crossfire: Kill Strelok
Crossfire: Search Strelok's corpse
Crossfire: Return to Major Hernandez
Major Hernandez has assigned me to extract information from Strelok, but I must eliminate the Military force chasing him on the outskirts of Pripyat first.
The military squad has been eliminated. Time to obtain Strelok's secrets, one way or the other.
I can help Strelok by escorting him to the Red Forest. Alternatively, I could capture him by luring him into the UNISG base, in Jupiter Underground.
Strelok and I have safely reached the Red Forest, as promised. Maybe he's ready to talk now.
Strelok can't escape us now. Time to put him down.
Strelok is dead. I should search his body for any useful information he might've been carrying.
I found a flashdrive amongst Strelok's belongings. Major Hernandez should see this as soon as possible.
Find %s for Maus
%s are required by Maus to install basic equipment upgrades. I should bring them back to him if I find any.
I have a proposition for you. If you can bring me some new tools, you will receive payment. Are you up for it?

There is. I've been looking all over for a set of %s. It should contain some oil and tools I need to do work on firearms. I'll pay you for one of those toolkits if you can bring a full set back to me.
Brilliant! This is what I've been looking for. Thanks!
Find %s for Maus
%s are required by Maus to install advanced equipment upgrades, I should bring them back to him if I find any.
I have another proposition. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of those, but if you can find one, I need it.
It's got everything I need. Thank you.
Find %s for Maus
%s are required by Maus to install expert equipment upgrades. I should bring them back to him if I find any.
I have another proposition. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of those, but if you can find one, I need it.
It's got everything I need. Thank you.
